metadata.description: What Fables does for fairy tales, Kill Shakespeare does with the greatest writer of all time.Â This dark take on the Bard pits his greatest heroes (Hamlet, Juliet, Othello Falstaff) against his most menacing villains (Richard III, Lady Macbeth, Iago) in an epic adventure to find and kill a reclusive wizard named William Shakespeare.Â
metadata.name: Kill Shakespeare
